archetypes.name: The Self
archetypes.description: Symbol of wholeness, unity, and the true inner self.

archetypes.name: The Shadow
archetypes.description: Repressed traits, fears, impulses, or the darker side of the psyche.

archetypes.name: The Persona
archetypes.description: The social mask or outward identity presented to others.

archetypes.name: The Anima
archetypes.description: Feminine qualities within a man, connected to emotion and intuition.

archetypes.name: The Animus
archetypes.description: Masculine qualities within a woman, connected to logic and decisiveness.

archetypes.name: The Hero
archetypes.description: The part of the psyche that seeks to overcome conflict and grow.

archetypes.name: The Maiden
archetypes.description: Innocence, renewal, and vulnerable emerging aspects of the self.

archetypes.name: The Wise Old Man
archetypes.description: Guidance, insight, and higher knowledge.

archetypes.name: The Wise Old Woman
archetypes.description: Intuition, deep knowing, and ancient feminine wisdom.

archetypes.name: The Great Mother
archetypes.description: Nurturing support or overwhelming emotional force.

archetypes.name: The Terrible Mother
archetypes.description: Destructive, chaotic, or engulfing feminine force.

archetypes.name: The Father
archetypes.description: Authority, structure, discipline, and inner rules.

archetypes.name: The Trickster
archetypes.description: Disruption, mischief, and rule-breaking energy.

archetypes.name: The Child
archetypes.description: Potential, rebirth, and vulnerability.

archetypes.name: The Heroine
archetypes.description: A feminine journey of transformation and individuation.

archetypes.name: The Warrior
archetypes.description: Assertiveness, boundaries, and protective strength.

archetypes.name: The King
archetypes.description: Order, leadership, and authority—wise or tyrannical.

archetypes.name: The Queen
archetypes.description: Emotional sovereignty, maturity, and responsibility.

archetypes.name: The Healer
archetypes.description: Restoration and transformation through suffering.

archetypes.name: The Stranger
archetypes.description: Unknown or emerging aspects of the self.

archetypes.name: The Doppelgänger
archetypes.description: A split self or unintegrated psychological traits.

archetypes.name: The Eternal Boy (Puer Aeternus)
archetypes.description: Youthful potential mixed with avoidance of responsibility.

archetypes.name: The Eternal Girl (Puella Aeterna)
archetypes.description: Dreamy, fragile femininity resisting grounded maturity.

archetypes.name: The Senex
archetypes.description: Rigid control, inhibition, and over-structuring.

archetypes.name: The Animus Figure
archetypes.description: Logical, forceful, or critical masculine presence in women's dreams.

archetypes.name: The Anima Figure
archetypes.description: Emotional, romantic, or intuitive feminine presence in men's dreams.

archetypes.name: Predator Animal
archetypes.description: Threatening force representing fear or repressed aggression.

archetypes.name: Companion Animal
archetypes.description: Instinct, intuition, and loyalty.

archetypes.name: Serpent
archetypes.description: Transformation, danger, or hidden wisdom.

archetypes.name: Bird
archetypes.description: Perspective, transcendence, or messages from the unconscious.

archetypes.name: Monster or Beast
archetypes.description: Primordial fear or denied emotional material.

archetypes.name: Horse
archetypes.description: Vital energy, drive, and unconscious power.

archetypes.name: The Underworld
archetypes.description: The deep unconscious, trauma, or hidden truths.

archetypes.name: The House
archetypes.description: The psyche itself; its rooms reflect different aspects of the self.

archetypes.name: The Forest
archetypes.description: Mystery, confusion, or entering the unconscious.

archetypes.name: The Ocean
archetypes.description: Vast emotions, overwhelm, or the collective unconscious.

archetypes.name: The Mountain
archetypes.description: Challenge, aspiration, or spiritual growth.

archetypes.name: The Bridge
archetypes.description: Transition between psychological states or life phases.

archetypes.name: The Road
archetypes.description: Life direction, purpose, and movement.

archetypes.name: The Key
archetypes.description: Access to knowledge or new psychological territory.

archetypes.name: The Weapon
archetypes.description: Power, agency, or protection.

archetypes.name: The Mask
archetypes.description: Hidden identity or false self.

archetypes.name: The Mirror
archetypes.description: Self-reflection, truth, or identity confrontation.

archetypes.name: The Door or Gate
archetypes.description: Opportunity, boundaries, or transition into the unconscious.

archetypes.name: The Pursuer
archetypes.description: Repressed content or conflict chasing integration.

archetypes.name: The Victim
archetypes.description: Inner helplessness or lack of power.

archetypes.name: The Rescuer
archetypes.description: Overcompensation, savior tendencies, or inner protection.

archetypes.name: The Seducer or Temptress
archetypes.description: Desire, fantasy, or risky emotional pull.

archetypes.name: The Destroyer
archetypes.description: Endings, ego death, or necessary transformation.

archetypes.name: The Creator
archetypes.description: Imagination, problem-solving, and generative energy.
